name: Bean VS Snow
description:
My first game is downloadable in itch.io.

W, A, S, D - Move

Space - jump

The game contains:

  1. Level selector
  2. 11 level
  3. Options, Pause menu

How to download:

  1. Download .zip file
  2. Place in a folder on you desktop
  3. Right click > Extract Here
  4. Double click on BeanVSSnow.exe

                   -Beta vesrion-
